Tips for the employer

  • Prioritize: Job qualifications will be used to disqualify applicants, so do not specify a qualification unless it is truly requires for the job. Focusing on only what you really need will maximize your qualified candidate pool.
  • Promote show not tell: Create questions that enable candidates to show you what they are capable of and how they will perfom in your job.
  • Use pre-set assessments: While you are welcome to adjust the assessment selections, our assessment suggestions are data driven and set by IO psychologist to give you reliable results while minimizing adverse impact.
  • Provide a good email address: We use your email address to send important alerts about your job and candidates.
